statements: SELECT * FROM Debtors;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name FROM Debtors WHERE outstanding_balance > 1000 ORDER BY debtor_name ASC;
SELECT debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM Debtors WHERE collection_progress < 3 ORDER BY outstanding_balance DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, payment_schedule, collection_progress FROM Debtors WHERE debtor_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Debtors WHERE payment_schedule LIKE 'Bi-weekly%';
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM Debtors WHERE collection_progress > 50 ORDER BY debtor_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Debtors WHERE outstanding_balance < 5000 ORDER BY debtor_id DESC
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, payment_schedule FROM Debtors WHERE collection_progress < 25 ORDER BY payment_schedule ASC, debtor_name DESC
SELECT debtor_name, payment_schedule FROM Debtors WHERE collection_progress >= 75 ORDER BY debtor_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Debtors WHERE collection_progress BETWEEN 25 AND 75 ORDER BY debtor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Debtors;
SELECT debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM Debtors WHERE outstanding_balance > 1000;
SELECT debtor_name, payment_schedule FROM Debtors ORDER BY debtor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Collections WHERE collection_amount > 500 ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT debtor_name, collection_amount FROM Debtors JOIN Collections ON Debtors.debtor_id = Collections.debtor_id WHERE collection_amount > 1000;
SELECT debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM Debtors WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_name, payment_schedule FROM Debtors WHERE outstanding_balance > 1000;
SELECT debtor_name, outstanding_balance, payment_schedule FROM Debtors JOIN Collections ON Debtors.debtor_id = Collections.debtor_id WHERE Collections.collection_amount > 500;

SELECT debtor_name, collection_date, collection_amount FROM Debtors JOIN Collections ON Debtors.debtor_id = Collections.debtor_id WHERE Collections.collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM Debtors ORDER BY outstanding_balance DESC, debtor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM debtors;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM debtors WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM debtors WHERE outstanding_balance > 1000;
SELECT payment_date, amount_due FROM payment_schedules WHERE debtor_id = 2 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, collection_status, comments FROM collection_progress WHERE collection_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM debtors;
SELECT * FROM debtors ORDER BY debtor_name ASC;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, amount_due FROM debtors JOIN payment_schedules ON debtors.debtor_id = payment_schedules.debtor_id WHERE debtor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT debtor_id, collection_status, comments FROM collection_progress WHERE collection_status = 'Pending';

SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, payment_date, amount_due FROM debtors JOIN payment_schedules ON debtors.debtor_id = payment_schedules.debtor_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, outstanding_balance, last_payment_date FROM debtors_outstanding_balances;
SELECT schedule_id, debtor_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payment_schedules ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT progress_id, debtor_id, collection_date, collection_status FROM collection_progress WHERE collection_status = 'Pending';
SELECT management_id, debtor_id, collection_progress_id, payment_schedule_id FROM debt_management WHERE debtor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM debtors_outstanding_balances WHERE outstanding_balance > 5000;
SELECT debtor_id, outstanding_balance FROM debtors_outstanding_balances;
SELECT * FROM payment_schedules ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, MAX(outstanding_balance) AS max_balance FROM debtors_outstanding_balances GROUP BY debtor_id HAVING MAX(outstanding_balance) > 5000;
SELECT d.debtor_id, d.outstanding_balance, p.payment_amount FROM debtors_outstanding_balances AS d JOIN payment_schedules AS p ON d.debtor_id = p.debtor_id WHERE p.payment_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT c.debtor_id, c.collection_date, c.collection_status, p.payment_amount FROM collection_progress AS c LEFT JOIN payment_schedules AS p ON c.debtor_id = p.debtor_id WHERE c.collection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY c.collection_date ASC, p.payment_amount DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM debtors;
SELECT * FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT debtor_name, outstanding_balance, collection_progress FROM debtors ORDER BY outstanding_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM collections WHERE collection_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT debtor_name, collection_notes FROM collections JOIN debtors ON collections.debtor_id = debtors.debtor_id WHERE collections.collection_status = 'Completed';
SELECT debtor_name, outstanding_balance FROM debtors WHERE collection_progress > 50 ORDER BY outstanding_balance DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, collection_progress, collection_date FROM debtors d JOIN collections c ON d.debtor_id = c.debtor_id WHERE c.collection_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;

SELECT d.debtor_name, ds.amount_due, c.collection_date FROM debtors d JOIN payment_schedules ds ON d.debtor_id = ds.debtor_id JOIN collections c ON d.debtor_id = c.debtor_id WHERE c.collection_status <> 'Closed' ORDER BY ds.amount_due DESC, c.collection_date ASC;
SELECT debtor_name, category_name, description FROM debtors d JOIN debt_categories dc ON d.debtor_id = dc.category_id WHERE d.collection_progress <= 25 ORDER BY debtor_name ASC, category_name DESC;
SELECT d.debtor_id, dl.log_date, dl.log_description, dl.log_type FROM debtors d JOIN debt_logs dl ON d.debtor_id = dl.debtor_id WHERE dl.log_type = 'Payment' ORDER BY dl.log_date DESC;
